name: Life Journey (WhatsTheSplit?, moathAlawwad, Hazim Abudayeh)
description:
This game only moves forward you can't go back and you will face some puzzles 

Instructions:

Play with W , D , mouse click

D: to move forward

W: to climb ladders

mouse click: to play the puzzle

ps: play with full screen

This game was made by 3 devs:

Moath Al-Awwad

Hazim AbuDayeh

Hamza Obaid
